The STEPS Young Engineers Award 2024-2025 is now open for registration! Would highly recommend to 3rd and 4th class teachers. üòÉ The competition involves your students designing solutions for a local community problem, which could be easily linked to so many subjects for integrated project based learning! There is also the opportunity to request an engineer visit to your classroom to inspire the children! Register at: https://steps.smapply.io/

If you are new to junior classes this year, make sure to check out ‚ÄòNumberblocks‚Äô on YouTube! It‚Äôs a brilliant cartoon based on numbers and other mathematical concepts. So much learning and the kids really enjoy it!

‚ÄòAlphablocks‚Äô is a similar show based on phonics and is well worth checking out too.
